Package Actors

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
Actors.MovingImage
Actors.Ball
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Ball
extends MovingImage
The Ball class represents a real life basketball in the Game.
Author:
josh_choi
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(int x, int y, int width, int height, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String uniqueID)
      Instantiates a new Ball at initial coordinates (x, y) with the specified size of width and heights
      Parameters:
      x - Initial X-Coordinate of the ball
      y - Initial Y-Coordinate of the ball
      width - Width of the basketball
      height - Height of the basketball
      username - Name of the ball
      uniqueID - A string used to uniquely identify the ball

  • Method Details

    • block

      public void block​(Player p, Player player2, double floorY)
      Executes actions that allow the players to block each other's shots
      Parameters:
      p - Player currently shooting the ball
      player2 - Opponent who is able to block the shot
      floorY - The Y coordinate of the floor
      Precondition:
      Players have been instantiated and are not null
      Postcondition:
      The ball is either blocked or continues on its path

    • act

      public void act​(Player p, double floorY)
      Executes ball actions, Calculates velocities of the ball, and updates coordinates of the ball according to movement or action
      Parameters:
      p - The player that is doing the action upon the ball
      floorY - The Y-Coordinate of the floor
      Precondition:
      Player p is not null
      Postcondition:
      X-coordinate, Y-Coordinate, X velocity, Y velocity, and appropriate booleans are changed according to action

    • setPlayerDribbling

      public void setPlayerDribbling()
      Updates the player who is dribbling to null and gets rid of ownership of the ball
      Postcondition:
      Player currently dribbling the ball is null and the player is also set to not having the ball

    • setDribbling

      public void setDribbling​(boolean x)
      Updates the dribbling status of the ball
      Parameters:
      x - True if the ball should start dribbling and false if not
      Postcondition:
      The ball stops horizontally moving but vertically by default moves down and begins to dribble if parameter is true

    • hasPlayer

      public boolean hasPlayer()
      Checks to see if ball is being controlled by player or not
      Returns:
      True if there is a player and false if not

    • bounce

      public void bounce​(Player p)
      The action of the ball bouncing
      Parameters:
      p - The player that was bouncing the ball
      Precondition:
      Player p is not null
      Postcondition:
      The x and y coordinates are updated as well as the appropriate velocities of the ball as it begins the bouncing motion

    • moveToGround

      public void moveToGround()
      Moves ball to the ground
      Postcondition:
      The y coordinate of the ball is 280

    • dribble

      public void dribble​(double floorY)
      The action of the ball being dribbled by a player
      Parameters:
      floorY - The y coordinate of the floor
      Precondition:
      The player dribbling the ball is not null
      Postcondition:
      Appropriate x, y, and velocities are updated as the ball begins to dribble

    • shoot

      public void shoot​(double hoopx, double hoopy)
      The action of the ball being shot by a player
      Parameters:
      hoopx - The x coordinate of the hoop
      hoopy - The y coordinate of the hoop
      Precondition:
      A player is currently dribbling the ball
      Postcondition:
      The ball is on its trajectory in the arc motion towards the hoop. X, Y, and velocities are updated. Also, the score is updated in addition to the probability of making a shot.

    • isShooting

      public boolean isShooting()
      Finds and gets to see if the ball is currently in the shooting process or not
      Returns:
      True if the ball is shooting and false if not

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer​(Player p)
      Sets the player to having possession of the ball
      Parameters:
      p - The player who possesses the ball
      Postcondition:
      The player who owns the ball is updated in addition to the state of the player being updated

    • getDataObject

      public BallData getDataObject()
      Gets the data about the ball object for the online services
      Returns:
      BallData object containing data about the ball object

    • syncWithDataObject

      public void syncWithDataObject​(BallData data)
      Syncs the ball with the current ball data object for firebase purposes
      Parameters:
      data - The ball data object used
      Postcondition:
      Data about ball is updated

    • idMatch

      public boolean idMatch​(java.lang.String uid)
      Checks to see if the id matches
      Parameters:
      uid - The user id to check for matching
      Returns:
      True if it is a match and false if not

      Returns:
      true if data is updated and false if not

      public boolean getDribbling()
      Finds and gets the state of if the ball is being dribbled or not
      Returns:
      returns true if the ball is being dribbled

      public java.lang.String getUsername()
      Gets the username of the ball
      Returns:

      Returns:
      double containing the y coordinate of the ball

    • increaseProbability

      public void increaseProbability()
      Increases the probability of the player making a shot
      Postcondition:
      the percentage of making a shot is increased by 20 percent

    • decreaseProbability

      public void decreaseProbability()
      Returns the probability of making a shot back to normal
      Postcondition:
      the percentage of making a shot is back to normal and not affected by a factor

    • isOnGround

      public boolean isOnGround()
      Checks to see if the ball is on the ground or not
      Returns:
      True if it is and false if not

    • isInAir

      public boolean isInAir()
      Checks to see if the ball is in the air or not
      Returns:
      True if the ball is in air, and false if not
